briefdescription.para: This is where to input logic and extend functionality of ErrorHandlerModule.

detaileddescription.para: Optional: Header (e.g. The header of a Dialogue box)

briefdescription.para: Optional: Prefix (e.g. Fixed text at the start of the messages in the module)
Optional: The UI the handler might generally use
Holds the last thrown error in this module, defaults to 0.
Holds the last additional info passed in.

memberdef.type: protected ref map< int, ref ErrorProperties >
memberdef.definition: protected ref map<int, ref ErrorProperties> m_ErrorDataMap
memberdef.name: m_ErrorDataMap

briefdescription.para: Map containing the codes that exist for the ErrorHandlerModule The code links to ErrorProperties This contains at the very least the Message for the error Additionally, it can contain the way to handle the error (e.g. Throw a Dialogue with the message)
Constructor, by default calls the function that will fill the ErrorDataMap.
Function which gets called before FillErrorDataMap, designed to set Optional Variales before ErrorProperties are created.
Function to fill up m_ErrorDataMap, gets called in the Constructor.

inbodydescription.para: Already insert the default "UNKNOWN ERROR" message for code "-1"

briefdescription.para: Fetches the ErrorProperties for the error code.

simplesect.para: ErrorProperties The data and handling for the error

briefdescription.para: Fetches the Client message for the error code.

simplesect.para: string The Client message for the error

briefdescription.para: Fetches the Client message for the error code, attempting to retrieve the data from the latest.

parameterdescription.para: int The full error code to check against

simplesect.para: string The Client message for the error

briefdescription.para: Fetches the Server message for the error code.

simplesect.para: string The Server message for the error

briefdescription.para: Fetches the Server message for the error code, attempting to retrieve the data from the latest.

parameterdescription.para: int The full error code to check against

simplesect.para: string The Server message for the error

briefdescription.para: Event that gets triggered when an error of the owned category is thrown. Do not call directly! Call ErrorModuleHandler.ThrowError instead.

parameterdescription.para: string Any additional info regarding the error, usually data

memberdef.argsstring: (int code, string message, int dialogButtonType=DBT_OK, int defaultButton=DBB_OK, int dialogMeaningType=DMT_EXCLAMATION, bool displayAdditionalInfo=true)
memberdef.name: InsertDialogueErrorProperties

briefdescription.para: Insert an error with Dialogue as handling, using the Optional Variables.

memberdef.argsstring: (int code, string message, string header, int dialogButtonType=DBT_OK, int defaultButton=DBB_OK, int dialogMeaningType=DMT_EXCLAMATION, bool displayAdditionalInfo=true)

briefdescription.para: Insert an error with Dialogue as handling with custom header.

memberdef.argsstring: (int code, string message, string prefix, int dialogButtonType=DBT_OK, int defaultButton=DBB_OK, int dialogMeaningType=DMT_EXCLAMATION, bool displayAdditionalInfo=true)

briefdescription.para: Insert an error with Dialogue as handling with custom prefix.

memberdef.argsstring: (int code, string message, string prefix, int dialogButtonType=DBT_OK, int defaultButton=DBB_OK, int dialogMeaningType=DMT_EXCLAMATION, bool displayAdditionalInfo=true)

Insert an error with no handling.
